title: “Pneumocystosis revealing immunodeficiency secondary to TERC mutation.” Raphael Borie, Caroline Kannengiesser, Flore Sicre de Fontbrune, David Boutboul, Laure Tabeze, Florence Brunet-Possenti, Elodie Lainey, Marie Pierre Debray, Aurélie Cazes and Bruno Crestani. Eur RespirJ 2017; 50: 1701443.
